snippet: A strengthening housing market and low interest rates spurred consumers and businesses to replace aging models.
abstract: Automakers report that March 2013 sales of new cars and trucks were highest monthly total in five years, providing further evidence of sustained turnaround in industry.
lead_paragraph: A strengthening housing market and low interest rates spurred consumers and businesses to replace aging models.

headline.main: March Auto Sales Increased 3.4% for Highest Total Since 2007
headline.print_headline: March Auto Sales Increased 3.4% for Highest Total Since 2007
